title: Cosmic Queries – Space Suits with Ana Diaz Artiles
description:
What’s the future of space suits? On this episode, Neil deGrasse Tyson and comic co-host Matt Kirshen explore innovation in space suit technology with aerospace engineer Ana Diaz Artiles. 

NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free here: https://startalkmedia.com/show/cosmic-queries-space-suits-with-ana-diaz-artiles/

Photo Credit: NASA, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson, Matt Kirshen, Ana Diaz Artiles)
